news.title: Overlay
news.text: Overlay mode has been introduced. You can activate it in the menu, next to the Picture-in-picture button.

news.title: Indicators
news.text: Tiny indicators have been added to show how many audio sessions the window can host with its current size.

news.title: Language
news.text: More menus have been translated, and translations are being worked on.

changes: Inactive audio sessions will now be shown on startup by default.
bugs: On some computers, pluggin/unplugging an audio jack will crash the app. The issue seems to be coming from the audio driver application.
Audio sessions will need to be reloaded manually after the computer has been put to sleep or hibernation.
